controller.moveHandler

Class AbstractMoveHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.moveHandler.AbstractMoveHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMoveHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BishopMoveHandler, KingMoveHandler, KnightMoveHandler, PawnMoveHandler, QueenMoveHandler, RookMoveHandler

    abstract class AbstractMoveHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMoveHandler
    A abstract moveHandler which are hold the code, which are equals in all moveHandler

                        int xDirection,
                        int yDirection)
        Check if a figure has a turn in a specific direction
        Parameters:

        gameField - The game field of which the figure stand.

        xDirection - The x-Direction. It is the step size for checking.
